src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: Habdhaqankoda heerkul ahaned uma toosna umana weyna sida godadka waweyn ee dhulka kuwaasi oo badiyaa leh heerkul aan is dhimin, balse waxay ka koobantahay godad dhaadheer oo dhulka ah," sida waxa yidhi Glen cushing ka maraykanka ee ka shaqeya arimaha dhagxanta (USGS) iyo kooxda xidigiska ee waqooyiga jamacadda Arizona ee ku taala Flagstaff,Arizona.
hyp_text: Waa inoo badan oo leh caafimaadka diyaar ku leh si farsamo badan oo dhan, isla markaan waa in la xidhiidha inay tahay burcabood oo dhan ku dhaaf ah, waxaa la ahaa Glen Cushiing oo ah xidhiidhka Geologiyaasha Dalka Mareykanka (USGS) iyo Jamiyadda Arizona Koonfur ee Arizona.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Saddexda boqortooya ayaa ahaayeen xiliyada ugu dhiig daadinta badnaa ee taariikhda Shiinaha Qadiimka kumanaan qof ayaa ku dhintay inay ku fariistaank kursiga ugu sare ee boqortooyada wayn ee Xi’an.
hyp_text: Dalka Sida ee Three Kingdoms waxaa loo yaqaanay ee ugu weyn ee sharciga ee Soomaaliya ee ugu horeyey, afar ah oo ka dhacay in ay ku soo xulay xildhaweyn ee ugu dhaw ee xeebaha guud ee Xi'an.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: Ahraamta waawayn waxaa loo sameeyay in lagu maamuso Pharaoh Khufu, qaarbadan oo kamida ahraamta, dhagxaanta waweyn, iyo bacbadada waxaa loo dhisay in lagu maamuuso xaasaska iyo xubnaha qoyska Khafu.
hyp_text: Waa ku dhexeeyay si aad ugu yaraan dhexeeyay Pharaoh Khufu, iyo dadka kasta ee pyramidaas, qabrida, iyo masaajida ee ku dhexeeyay sababtu waa ku dhexeeyay xawliyihii iyo ku dhaqaanada Khufu.

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
ref_text: Mid kamida qaababka ugu caansan ee lagu soo bandhigo faa'iidada isdhex galka bulsho ayaa ah in lasoo qaato dhowr tusaale oo nasiib daraa ee caruurta la dayacay, nasiib xumo ku habsatay, si kasa loo dhibaateye, ama ka gooni socod ahaa bulshada inteeda waa weyn inte korayen.
hyp_text: Waa mid ka mid ah midaha asal ah ee lagu sameeyay in ay ku soo bandhigayso dhamaan qofka ku dhaqan lahaa, waxaana lagu soo bandhigayso dhaqan lahaa, dhaqan lahaa, ama dhaqan lahaa, oo ku dhaqan lahaa, waxaana lagu soo bandhigayso dhaqan lahaa.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
ref_text: Tusaalayaasha ugu fiican kan waxa ka mida ololihii dagaalka North Atlantic WWII. Maraynkanku waxay isku dayayeen inay alaab iyo rag ka tallaabiyaan Badwaynta Atlaantiga si ay u caawiyaan Ingiriiska.
hyp_text: Waa mid ah cudurkii ugu weyn ee xigaynayay ee hadda, waxana ayaa ka soo baxay ka dib markaas ee maalinta Dhexe Atlantika ee Dhexe ee Dhexe. Amrikaanka ayaa ka soo jeeda inay wax u qabto dad iyo warqadaha ku dhaawac ah Atlantic Ocean ku xarunta Britain.
